XmlWorldData.name: Maze Tutorial 2
XmlWorldData.description: Kodu Maze Tutorial, part 2, created for the 2014 Hour of Code. Visit https://www.youtube.com/user/KoduTeam for a video walk-through of this tutorial.

value.string: Лабиринт, Часть 2, создан для Hour of Code 2014. Посмотри видео https://www.youtube.com/user/KoduTeam по уроку.

XmlWorldData.creator: KoduTeam

value.string: Программирование лабиринта 2

Step.GamepadText:
Welcome back! This is Maze Tutorial 2!
This time Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> is lost AND HUNGRY.
To find the entrance and exit of the maze look for <filter.castle><filter.castle> Look in the maze for 3 <filter.fruit> Find Bro-du and lead him <filter.hut>!
Step.MouseText:
Welcome back! This is Maze Tutorial 2!
This time Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> is lost AND HUNGRY.
To find the entrance and exit of the maze look for <filter.castle><filter.castle> Look in the maze for 3 <filter.fruit> Find Bro-du and lead him <filter.hut>!

value.string:
С возвращением! Это второй урок по программированию лабиринта!
Сейчас Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> потерялся и ГОЛОДЕН.
Чтобы отыскать выход и выйти из лабиринта, ищи <filter.castle><filter.castle>. Найди в лабиринте 3 <filter.fruit>. Найди Bro-du и отведи его к <filter.hut>!

Step.TouchText:
Welcome back! This is Maze Tutorial 2!
This time Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> is lost AND HUNGRY.
To find the entrance and exit of the maze look for <filter.castle><filter.castle> Look in the maze for 3 <filter.fruit> Find Bro-du and lead him <filter.hut>!

Step.Comment: Statement 1 What we'll be doing text

value.string: Программирование лабиринта 2

Step.GamepadText: Before we go hunting for <filter.fruit> let's look at what have to do first: (1) Program Kodu<filter.white><kodu> to pick up <filter.fruit> (2) Program scoring 1 point per <filter.fruit> (3) Program Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> to follow Kodu once 3 points have been scored. Let's get started!
Step.MouseText: Before we go hunting for <filter.fruit> let's look at what have to do first: (1) Program Kodu<filter.white><kodu> to pick up <filter.fruit> (2) Program scoring 1 point per <filter.fruit> (3) Program Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> to follow Kodu once 3 points have been scored. Let's get started!

value.string: Прежде, чем мы начнем охотиться за <filter.fruit>, давай опеределимся, что нужно сделать в первую очередь: :1) Запрограммировать Kodu<filter.white><kodu>, чтобы он подбирал <filter.fruit>. :2) Запрограммировать начисление 1 балла за <filter.fruit>. :3) Запрограммировать Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu>, чтобы он следовал за Kodu только если набрано 3 балла. Давай начнем!

Step.TouchText: Before we go hunting for <filter.fruit> let's look at what have to do first: (1) Program Kodu<filter.white><kodu> to pick up <filter.fruit> (2) Program scoring 1 point per <filter.fruit> (3) Program Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> to follow Kodu once 3 points have been scored. Let's get started!

value.string: Kodu<filter.white><kodu> подбирает <filter.fruit> (Шаг 1/3)

Step.GamepadText: In row 4 Add WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> You can find <filter.fruit> in <group.objects>
Step.MouseText: In row 4 Add WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> You can find <filter.fruit> in <group.objects>

value.string: В 4 строчку добавь КОГДА <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> <filter.fruit> находится в <group.objects>

Step.TouchText: In row 4 Add WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> You can find <filter.fruit> in <group.objects>

value.string: Kodu<filter.white><kodu> подбирает <filter.fruit> (Шаг 2/3)

Step.GamepadText: In row 4 Add WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> You can find <filter.fruit> in <group.objects>
Step.MouseText: Row 4 add DO <actuator.vanish> <modifier.it> You can find <actuator.vanish> in the <group.combat> option When done it should look like WHEN <sensor.bumpers> <filter.fruit> DO <actuator.vanish> <modifier.it>

value.string: В 4 строчку добавь ДЕЛАТЬ <actuator.vanish> <modifier.it> Ты можешь найти <actuator.vanish> в группе <group.combat> У тебя должно получиться Когда <sensor.bumpers> <filter.fruit> Делать <actuator.vanish> <modifier.it>

Step.TouchText: In row 4 Add WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> You can find <filter.fruit> in <group.objects>

value.string: Программирование Kodu<filter.white><kodu> (Шаг 3/3)

Step.GamepadText: Super! Now that you've programmed Kodu<filter.white><kodu> to collect <filter.fruit> it's time to run the game again and see your work in action.
Step.MouseText: Super! Now that you've programmed Kodu<filter.white><kodu> to collect <filter.fruit> it's time to run the game again and see your work in action.

value.string: Супер! Теперь ты запрограммировал Kodu<filter.white><kodu>, чтобы он собирал <filter.fruit>. Пора снова запустить игру на выполнение и посмотреть на результат.

Step.TouchText: Super! Now that you've programmed Kodu<filter.white><kodu> to collect <filter.fruit> it's time to run the game again and see your work in action.

value.string: Запуск программы (Шаг 3/3)

Step.GamepadText: Use the left stick <leftstick> to move Kodu and bump the apple<filter.fruit>.
Step.MouseText: Use the <filter.arrowkeys> to move Kodu and bump the apple<filter.fruit>.

value.string: Используй <filter.arrowkeys>, чтобы перемещать Kodu и врезаться в яблоки<filter.fruit>.

Step.TouchText: Tap the screen to move Kodu and bump the apple<filter.fruit>.

Step.Comment: Time to see apple Vanish on Bump.

value.string: Запуск программы (Шаг 3/3)

Step.Comment: Statement 2 What we'll be doing text

value.string: Начисление баллов за <filter.fruit>(1/2)

Step.GamepadText: Got it! This next WHEN DO statement we program will give us one point for every apple Kodu collects. The programming statement looks like this WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> DO <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.white><modifier.001point> Let's get programming!
Step.MouseText: Got it! This next WHEN DO statement we program will give us one point for every apple Kodu collects. The programming statement looks like this WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> DO <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.white><modifier.001point> Let's get programming!

value.string: В следующей команде КОГДА ДЕЛАТЬ надо запрограммировать начисление 1 балла за каждое собранное Kodu яблоко. Команда будет выглядеть так: Когда <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> Делать <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.white><modifier.001point> Начинай программировать!

Step.TouchText: Got it! This next WHEN DO statement we program will give us one point for every apple Kodu collects. The programming statement looks like this WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> DO <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.white><modifier.001point> Let's get programming!

value.string: Начисление баллов за <filter.fruit>(Шаг 1/2)

Step.GamepadText: Move to row 5 and program WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> DO <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.white><modifier.001point> The score tile <actuator.score> is in the game group <group.game> white <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> is in the scores group <group.scorebucketmodifiers>
Step.MouseText: Move to row 5 and program WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> DO <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.white><modifier.001point> The score tile <actuator.score> is in the game group <group.game> white <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> is in the scores group <group.scorebucketmodifiers>

value.string: Перейди на 5 строчку и запрограммируй Когда <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> Делать <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.white><modifier.001point> <actuator.score> находится в группе <group.game>

Step.TouchText: Move to row 5 and program WHEN <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> DO <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.white><modifier.001point> The score tile <actuator.score> is in the game group <group.game> white <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> is in the scores group <group.scorebucketmodifiers>

CompletionTest.Name: Kode
CompletionTest.Args: reflex 5 sensor.bumpers filter.fruit actuator.score modifier.scorebucket.color.white modifier.001point

Step.Comment: Pause when done with the programming.

value.string: Начисление баллов за <filter.fruit>(Шаг 2/2)

Step.Comment: Statement 3 What we'll be doing text
Step.GoalText: If we have 3 <filter.fruit> Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> will follow Kodu<filter.white><kodu>(1/3)

value.string: Если у нас есть 3 <filter.fruit>, Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> должен следовать за Kodu<filter.white><kodu>(1/3)

Step.GamepadText: Great work, we're almost done! The last statement we need will be on Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> We are going to use the <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> to tell Bro-du to follow Kodu ONLY WHEN 3 <filter.fruit> have been collected. Let's find out how!
Step.MouseText: Great work, we're almost done! The last statement we need will be on Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> We are going to use the <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> to tell Bro-du to follow Kodu ONLY WHEN 3 <filter.fruit> have been collected. Let's find out how!

value.string: Отлично, почти все сделано! И наконец, добавим еще одну команду в программу Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu>. :1) Нам понадобится использовать фильтр <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> :2) Cообщить Bro-du, что он должен следовать за Kodu ТОЛЬКО КОГДА 3 <filter.fruit> будет собрано. Подумай, как это сделать!

Step.TouchText: Great work, we're almost done! The last statement we need will be on Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> We are going to use the <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> to tell Bro-du to follow Kodu ONLY WHEN 3 <filter.fruit> have been collected. Let's find out how!

Step.GoalText: If we have 3 <filter.fruit> Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu>will follow Kodu<filter.white><kodu>(0/3)

value.string: Если у нас есть 3 <filter.fruit>, Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> должен следовать за Kodu<filter.white><kodu>(0/3)

Step.GoalText: If we have 3 <filter.fruit> Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu>will follow Kodu<filter.white><kodu>(1/3)

value.string: Если у нас есть 3 <filter.fruit>, Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> должен следовать за Kodu<filter.white><kodu>(1/3)
В 1 строчку добавь КОГДА <sensor.scored><modifier.scorebucket.color.white><filter.scoreequals><modifier.003points>

Step.GoalText: If we have 3 <filter.fruit> Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> will follow Kodu<filter.white><kodu>(2/3)

value.string: Если у нас есть 3 <filter.fruit>, Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> должен следовать за Kodu<filter.white><kodu>(2/3)

Step.GamepadText: Indent Row 2 so that it's under row 1 <sensor.eyes><kodu><filter.white><filter.lineofsight> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest><modifier.quickly> Do this by pressing and holding A then flicking to the right with your left joystick.
Step.MouseText: Indent Row 2 so that it's under row 1 <sensor.eyes><kodu><filter.white><filter.lineofsight> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest><modifier.quickly> Do this by clicking and dragging the row to the right.

value.string: Сдвинь 2 строчку так, чтобы она начиналась под 1 строкой <sensor.eyes><kodu><filter.white><filter.lineofsight> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest><modifier.quickly> Это можно сделать, щелкнув по 2 строке и потянув ее вправо.

Step.TouchText: Indent Row 2 so that it's under row 1 <sensor.eyes><kodu><filter.white><filter.lineofsight> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest><modifier.quickly> Do this by tapping the row 2 icon and then dragging your finger to the right.

CompletionTest.Name: Kode
CompletionTest.Args: reflex 2 indent 1 sensor.eyes filter.bokubot filter.white filter.lineofsight actuator.movement selector.towardclosest modifier.quickly

Step.Comment: Pause when done with the programming.
Step.GoalText: If we have 3 <filter.fruit> Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> will follow Kodu<filter.white><kodu>(2/3)

value.string: Если у нас есть 3 <filter.fruit>, Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> должен следовать за Kodu<filter.white><kodu>(2/3)
Запуск программы (Шаг 3/3)

Step.GamepadText: Way to go! In this tutorial we've learned: (1) how to make an object vanish when bumped (2) to use scores to count <filter.fruit> collected and (3) how to use that count to trigger Bro-du to follow Kodu home.
Step.MouseText: Way to go! In this tutorial we've learned: (1) how to make an object vanish when bumped (2) to use scores to count <filter.fruit> collected and (3) how to use that count to trigger Bro-du to follow Kodu home.

value.string: Так держать! В этом уроке мы узнали: :1) как сделать объект невидимым, когда в него врезаются :2) как использовать баллы для подсчета собранных <filter.fruit> и :3) как использовать набранные очки, чтобы дать Bro-du понять, что можно идти домой за Kodu.

Step.TouchText: Way to go! In this tutorial we've learned: (1) how to make an object vanish when bumped (2) to use scores to count <filter.fruit> collected and (3) how to use that count to trigger Bro-du to follow Kodu home.

Step.GamepadText:
After playing the maze can you try:
1)Adding in new objects <group.objects>into the scene? 2)Program <kodu> to pick them up with <sensor.bumpers> and <actuator.vanish>? 3)Program <kodu> to gain <sensor.scored><modifier.scorebucket.color.white> when <kodu><sensor.bumpers><group.objects>?
Step.MouseText:
After playing the maze can you try:
1)Adding in new objects <group.objects>into the scene? 2)Program <kodu> to pick them up with <sensor.bumpers> and <actuator.vanish>? 3)Program <kodu> to gain <sensor.scored><modifier.scorebucket.color.white> when <kodu><sensor.bumpers><group.objects>?

value.string:
Пройдя лабиринт ты можешь попробовать:
:1) Добавить новые объекты <group.objects> в сцену. :2) Запрограммировать <kodu>, чтобы он собирал их, используя <sensor.bumpers> и <actuator.vanish>. :3) Запрограммировать <kodu> увеличивать счет <sensor.scored><modifier.scorebucket.color.white>, когда <kodu><sensor.bumpers><group.objects>?

Step.TouchText:
After playing the maze can you try:
1)Adding in new objects <group.objects>into the scene? 2)Program <kodu> to pick them up with <sensor.bumpers> and <actuator.vanish>? 3)Program <kodu> to gain <sensor.scored><modifier.scorebucket.color.white> when <kodu><sensor.bumpers><group.objects>?

value.string: Запуск программы (Шаг 3/3)

Step.GamepadText: Use the left stick <leftstick> to move Kodu, find all 3 <filter.fruit> , and finally take Bro-du out of the maze.
Step.MouseText: Use the <filter.arrowkeys> to move Kodu, find all 3 <filter.fruit> , and finally take Bro-du out of the maze.

value.string: Используй <filter.arrowkeys>, чтобы перемещать Kodu, найди 3 <filter.fruit>, и наконец выведи Bro-du из лабиринта.

Step.TouchText: Tap the screen to move Kodu, find all 3 <filter.fruit> , and finally take Bro-du out of the maze.
